activities: InetServices is a fast growing hosting service provider which offers a full compliment of services including web hosting, dedicated servers, and managed colocation.  The company focus is small and mid-sized businesses that require high reliability, security, and 24 / 7 support,  As a provider of selected wholesale telecommunications services, there are instances where the origination telephone and termination numbers of the eventual end user (call detail records) of our wholesale business customers would be collected in the EU and transferred to the U.S. for bill processing and fraud audit purposes.  This information is fully retained, and not shared, sold or otherwise distributed outside our company.
